config.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the configurations used in the app like theme, localization, etc. These values are constant and should not be changed during the runtime of the app.

constants.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the constants used in the app like API endpoints, colors, etc. These values are constant and should not be changed during the runtime of the app.

api.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the API endpoints used in the app.

colors.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the colors and gradients used in the app or for specific features.

app_colors.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the colors used in the app.
This file contains all the colors used in the app
This file contains all the semantics used in the app

app_gradients.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the gradients used in the app.
This file contains all the gradients used in the app

something_color.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the colors used for something.
This file contains all the colors required for something

data.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the data required for the app like locales, local data for entity , etc.

locales.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the locales used in the app

something_data.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the data required for something

enums.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the enums used in the app.

something_enum.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the enums required for something

something_else_enum.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the enums required for something else

hive.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the hive table id and box names used in the app

images.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the images used in the app.

app_images.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the images used in the app

something_images.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the images required for something

themes.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the themes used in the app, like text theme, color theme(light and dark), etc.

app_theme.DESCRIPTION: This file contains the app theme

text_theme.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the text styles that are used in the app
This file contains the custom text styles for the app

routes.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the routes used in the app

bloc.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the bloc providers that need to be registered in the app, also the common blocs that needs to use across the app.

app_bloc_observer.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the bloc observer used in the app

app_bloc_providers.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the bloc providers used in the app

locale_cubit.DESCRIPTION: This file contains cubit for locale
This file contains state for locale

common.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the common widgets,entities,models,hive ets, used in the app. If something needs to used across multiple features add it here.

custom_widgets.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the custom widgets used in the app
This file contains all the custom button used in the app
This file contains all the custom text field used in the app

entities.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the entities used in the app.

something_entity.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the entities required for something

something_else_entity.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the entities required for something else

models.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the models used in the app.

something_model.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the models required for something

something_else_model.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the models required for something else

repositories.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the repositories used in the app.

something_repository.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the repositories required for something

something_else_repository.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the repositories required for something else

pages.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the pages used in the app.

something_page.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the pages required for something

something_else_page.DESCRIPTION: This file contains all the pages required for something else

common_widgets.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the common widgets that doesn't belong to any feature used in the app.
This file contains the drawer used in the app
This file contains the loader used in the app

exports.DESCRIPTION: This file stores all the exports of the entire app

failure.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the file for failure.
This file contains the class for failure

localization.DESCRIPTION: This folder is for localization , add it to the pubspec.yaml file. User Flutter Intl extension

l10n.DESCRIPTION: This file contains the localization for english

services.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the services used in the app like api service, local storage service, etc.

api_service.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the services used for the api like dio, http or socket etc.
This file contains service for the dio client
This file contains all the interceptors used in the dio client

local_storage_service.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the services used for the local storage like shared preferences, hive etc.
This file contains service for the hive

usecase.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the generic usecase class.
This file contains the generic usecase class

utils.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the utility classes used in the app like extensions, validators, functions etc,

extensions.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the extensions used in the app
This file contains the text styles form the custom_text_styles.dart file as extension to the text theme
This file contains the text styles form the all_text_styles.dart file as extension to the text theme

functions.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains all the functions used in the app
This file contains function to check the connectivity and server status

core.DESCRIPTION: This file contains the main app widget

di.DESCRIPTION: This folder contains the dependency injection setup for the app.
This file contains the dependency injection setup for the app also nictate other di setup here.

lib.DESCRIPTION: This file contains the main  function
